text: The #Covid19 pandemic has had a devastating impact on ethnic minority communities. That’s why it’s so important we get the #CovidVaccine when we’re offered it. For the facts on the #vaccine, visit https://t.co/AaoIk2mX27 & watch this short video: https://t.co/w5sI4YyA00 https://t.co/X9p0F1Uhhp
